attributes.action: Candidates for Parliament to have work experience outside of politics.
attributes.background: People who aspire to rule over us should be able to demonstrate competencies beyond politics, together with experience in the real world.  A minimum work experience requirement could increase the capacity of the House of Commons to work collaboratively in the national interest.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the selection of parliamentary candidates is the responsibility of political parties and not the UK Government or Parliament.
